roleset.name: canonical, of a long established/typical form

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is classic

example.name: arg1
example.text: iamaloneintheworld , To shit on black men for two or three novel - long posts , and then use Barrack Obama as an example is classic .

example.name: both args
example.text: The story was classic in its premise , themes , and hopefulness .
